sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default{
    props:['slug'],
    data(){
        return{
            blogDetails:[]
        }
    },

    mounted(){
        this.getBlogDetails(this.rootDomain)
    },

    methods:{
       getBlogDetails(rootDomain){
            axios.get(rootDomain+'vue/blog/'+this.slug)
            .then((response)=>{
                console.log(response.data);
            })
            .catch((error)=>{
                console.log(error);
            })
       } 
    }
}
</script>
